category: news
title: "The voice actor behind Nintendo’s Mario is retiring"
excerpt: "Charles Martinet, who has been the voice of Mario in every Nintendo game since 1991, will no longer provide the sound of the iconic character, the company announced Monday. Nintendo stopped short of calling the move a retirement, noting Martinet would move into the role of “Mario Ambassador,” meeting with fans around the world."
